mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CustomerRedeemLibraryLog WHERE id = #{id} limit 1
SELECT * FROM CustomerRedeemLibraryLog ORDER BY id LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT ignore INTO CustomerRedeemLibraryLog ( CustomerId, ProjectId, IsSend, Created, Modified ) VALUES ( #{customerId}, #{projectId}, #{isSend}, #{created}, #{modified} )
